definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Use highlighters (colored pens) with texts to highlight forms that you are studying.
sentences.chinese: 用熒光筆在你讀的書上標示出這些形式。

sentences.english: Highlighter can help you by coloring and styling quotes of different level.
sentences.chinese: 熒光筆可以幫助您的色彩和風格不同的報價水平。

sentences.english: Particularly if you need a new cache of highlighter pens.
sentences.chinese: 特別是你需要申請一隻新的熒光筆。

sentences.english: Includes eyebrow shadows, eyeliners, and highlighters.
sentences.chinese: 包括眉陰影，眼線筆，和熒光筆。
